#### PR description:

Backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/47280, https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/47355,  https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/47473 (well, backported by dropping out the commit reverted there), and https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/47477 (the commit of the PR split in two, one to replace the commit dropped in the earlier step, and the rest included in the last commit of this PR).

Resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1248

#### PR validation:

Code compiles (plus the tests in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/47280 and https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/47355)

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/47280 and https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/47355
